## Loading dependencies and target

```{r dependencies}
library(targets)
library(mice)

data_imputed_binary <- tar_read(data_imputed_binary)
data_imputed_multi <- tar_read(data_imputed_multi)
```

## MICE diagnostic plots
### Binary sleep variables dataset

```{r plots_binary}
plot(data_imputed_binary)
```

### Ternary sleep variables dataset

```{r plots_multi}
plot(data_imputed_multi)
```
